article.headline: Navy 87, Stony Brook 76
article.story: STONY BROOK, N.Y. (AP) -- Greg Sprink scored 29 points to lead Navy to an 87-76 victory over Stony Brook on Sunday. Chris Harris came off the bench to add 21 for the Midshipmen (3-1) and reserve Adam Teague had 19. Mike Popoko and Ricky Lucas each had 20 points for the Seawolves (2-2), who were coming off the biggest win in school history -- on Friday night, they won 59-51 at Penn State. Lucas had seven points as Stony Brook, which scored the game's first nine points, jumped out to a 15-4 lead. Navy responded with a 19-5 run behind Sprink's seven points and a pair of 3-pointers by Harris. The Middies increased their lead to 34-24 on a 3-pointer by Teague. After the home team moved within 43-42 on Popko's jumper at 13:52 of the second half, Navy hit four unanswered 3-pointers -- two by Teague -- to build the lead to 55-42.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
